objects.text: Luxury Dark Chocolate | Best Gift Set | 100% Vegetarian | Pack of 3

product_details.name: Nooky Tempting Delights for uplifing mood (Packof 3) | Luxury Dark Chocolate Best Gift Set for Men & Women | instaeats
product_details.description:
Luxury Dark Chocolate Best Gift Set for Men & Women | instaeats
Specialty: Vegetarian. Weight: 200 Grams. Ingredient Type: Dark Chocolate & overall well-being. Contains 5 different herbs. Brand: InstaEats. Form: Bar. Package Information: Box. Net Quantity: 300.0 gram. Product Dimensions: 13 x 1 x 7.5 cm; 200 g. Ingredients: Dark Chocolate. Country of Origin: India. Item Weight: 200 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 1 x 7.5 Centimeters. Generic Name: Chocolate.

banner_details:
This banner design centers on promoting a premium chocolate product with a luxurious and elegant appeal. The backdrop features a rich radial gradient transitioning from a deep espresso brown to a darker chocolate hue. Golden radial concentric circles emanate from the center, enhancing visual focus. At the core lies an image of a woman holding a chocolate bar, framed perfectly to draw attention. There are five text layers: the bold "heading" at the top, a serif-styled "tagline" below it, followed by a slim "description" line showcasing product highlights. The bold "price" is prominently displayed near the bottom, followed by a rectangular golden "cta_background" with the "cta" text inviting user action. Delicate golden outlines and corner embellishments further emphasize the sophisticated aesthetic.

**Color Palette**:
- #482316 (Rich Brown)
- #2D1710 (Dark Chocolate)
- #3D1D14 (Warm Mocha)
- #D4AF37 (Gold)
- #F2D665 (Light Gold)
product_color: The product image features a rich and luxurious color palette that aligns perfectly with themes of elegance and indulgence. The dominant colors include deep chocolate brown (#4B2E2A) from the chocolate bar, accentuated by touches of gold (#D4AF37) in the logo and text for a premium feel. The woman's dress introduces a bold, romantic burgundy red (#8A1C26), which adds warmth and passion. Her dark brown hair (#3B2C26) and soft skin tones (#FAD8C5) create a natural and inviting blend. These colors are skillfully harmonized with warm lighting that highlights key elements, making the chocolate and branding visually appealing and high-end.
